content:
A
.
.
MK-1569
July 25, 1962
Nr. W. K. Ku Chief Engineer Shihmen Development Commission Shihmen Camp Taiwan
Subject: GSA Surplus Equipment
Dear Mr. Ku:
We learn from Mr. Carter, AID/T that the following equipment is available which we recommend be procurred through the regular channels.
Surplus listing: A-254-62-7187, 2 - Joy compressor units, 125 CFM. A-259-62-7187, 2 - Le Roy compressors, truck mounted, 210 CFM
It is our understanding that this equipment is in N-1 condition, is now located in Japan and can be shipped immediately.
Very truly yours, MORRISON-KNUDSEN OF ASIA, INC.
Ilerin Ce Viansen Glenn C. Johnson Project Manager
cc: Dam Construction Dept. Mr. J. B. Carter
RRK/TW
